#  Legal acts -- Department for International Students AGH 

URL: https://www.international.agh.edu.pl/en/studies/legal-acts
Crawled: 2025-03-19 21:19:56

Skip to content

Skip to footer

 Legal acts 

Payments

Order No 29/2019 of the AGH University Rector of 8 July 2019 on the Regulations on charging fees at degree programmes at the AGH University of Krakow (uniform text) - English version, PDF, 229 KB

Order No 29/2019 of the AGH University Rector of 8 July 2019 on the Regulations on charging fees at degree programmes at the AGH University of Krakow (uniform text) - Polish - English version PDF, 349 KB

payments for the academic year 2024/2025

Order No 29/2024 of the AGH University Rector of 23 May 2024 on the amount of fees for the provision of educational services at the AGH University of Krakow for students beginning their studies in the academic year 2024/2025, PDF, 83 KB

Appendix No 3 to the Order No. 29/2024 of the AGH University Rector of 23 May 2024 - amount of semester tuition fees for non-Polish nationals enrolling on full and part-time studies, first and second-cycle degree programmes held in Polish and English language at the AGH University, beginning their studies in the academic year 2024/2025, PDF, 184 KB

Order No 79/2024 of the AGH University Rector of 18 December 2024 on the amendment of the Order No 29/2024 of the AGH University Rector of 23 May 2024 on the amount of fees for the provision of educational services at the AGH University of Krakow for students beginning their studies in the academic year 2024/2025, PDF, 77 KB

Appendix No 2 to the Order No 79/2024 of the AGH University Rector of 17 December 2024 - amount of semester tuition fees for non-Polish national enrolling on full and part-time studies, first and second-cycle degree programmes held in Polish and English language at the AGH University, beginning their studies in the academic year 2024/2025, PDF, 194 KB

earlier legal acts regarding payments

Appendix No 3 to the Order No. 28/2023 of the AGH University Rector of 30 May 2023 - amount of semester tuition fees for non-Polish nationals enrolling on full and part-time studies, first and second-cycle degree programmes held in Polish and English language at AGH University, beginning their studies in the academic year 2023/2024, PDF, 178 KB

Appendix No 3 to the Order No. 37/2022 of the AGH University Rector of 23 May 2022 - amount of semester tuition fees for non-nationals enrolling on full and part-time studies, first and second-cycle degree programmes held in Polish and English language at AGH University, beginning their studies in the academic year 2022/2023, PDF, 147 KB

Appendix No 3 to the Order No. 30/2021 of the AGH University Rector of 26 May 2021 including amendments introduced by the Order No. 81/2021 of the AGH University Rector of 28 December 2021 - amount of semester tuition fees for non-nationals enrolling on full and part-time studies, first and second-cycle degree programmes held in Polish and English language at AGH University, beginning their studies in the academic year 2021/2022, PDF, 185 KB

Appendix No 3 to the Order No. 33/2020 of the AGH University Rector of 26 May 2020 - amount of semester tuition fees for non-nationals enrolling on full and part-time studies, first and second-cycle degree programmes held in Polish and English language at AGH University, beginning their studies in the academic year 2020/2021, PDF, 377 KB

Appendix No 3 to the Order No. 21/2019 of he AGH University Rector 27 May 2019 - amount of semester tuition fees for non-nationals enrolling on full and part-time studies, first and second-cycle degree programmes held in Polish and English language at AGH University, beginning their studies in the academic year 2019/2020, PDF, 181 KB

Recruitment

for the academic year 2024/2025

AGH University Senate Resolution No 123/2024 on 27 November 2024 on the amendments to the AGH University Senate Resolution No. 93/2023 on 28 June 2023 on conditions and procedure of admission and the date of beginning and completing the procedure of admission to the first year of first-cycle (Bachelor) and second-cycle (Master) studies beginning education cycle in the academic year 2024/2025, PDF, 675 KB

AGH University Senate Resolution No 48/2024 on 24 April 2024 on the amendments to the AGH University Senate Resolution No. 93/2023 on 28 June 2023 on conditions and procedure of admission and the date of beginning and completing the procedure of admission to the first year of first-cycle (Bachelor) and second-cycle (Master) studies beginning education cycle in the academic year 2024/2025, PDF, 699 KB

AGH University Senate Resolution No 93/2023 on 28 June 2023 on conditions and procedure of admission and the date of beginning and completing the procedure of admission to the for first year of first-cycle (Bachelor) and second-cycle (Master) studies beginning education cycle in the academic year 2024/2025, PDF, 452 KB

Order No 32/2024 of the AGH University Rector on 31 May 2024 on detailed principles of organising recruitment for candidates being non-Polish citizens for the first year of first-cycle and second-cycle studies in the academic year 2024/2025 and the amount of fees for the admission procedure, PDF, 308 KB

Order No 64/2024 of the AGH University Rector on 29 November 2024 on determination of a calendar of winter admission procedure for second-cycle degree programmes at AGH University for non-Polish citizens beginning their education cycle in the academic year 2024/2025, PDF, 114 KB

for the academic year 2025/2026

AGH University Senate Resolution No 69/2024 on 19 June 2024 on conditions and procedure of admission and the date of beginning and completing the procedure of admission to the first year of first-cycle (Bachelor) and second-cycle (Master) studies beginning education cycle in the academic year 2025/2026, PDF, 1,05 MB
